attributes.action: keep the a47 acle straight single carridgeway
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the a47 acle straight is dualled a)it will be harder to pull out from halvergate b)will cause even more congestion at gt yarmouth roundabout which cant cope with traffic as it is c)will just mean faster traffic and more accidents d)more greenbelt gone
